update.description:
Part 1 - Support nested model

Depends on sdformat [pull request #214](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/pull-requests/214/support-nesting-of-model-sdf-elements/diff)

example:

~~~
<model>
  <link> ... </link>
  ...
  <model>
    <link> ... </link>
      ...
  <model>
</model>
~~~

In this PR:

- update logic to find canonical link - there should only be one in the whole model tree

- add support for joints between nested models

- update model msgs so that they appear correctly on the rendering side


Still to come in later pull requests: 

- saving and loading nested models

- gui for interacting with nested models

- editing nested models
update.title: Nested model - part 1

content.raw:
Just some notes about what currently works for nested models and what doesn't:

* Logging: seems to record and playback correctly

* Editing: Missing nested models when loading in the editor

* Joint control panel: seems to work ok

* Model list widget: nested models don't show under parent model as they should.

* View collisions, CoM and so on: ok

* Inserting: 

    + Preview doesn't load nested models . 

    + Nested model doesn't show on model list at all.
  
    + Insert two instances of the same model - nested models don't collide with each other

* Copy / pasting: pasted nested model doesn't collide with original nested model but collides with other models.

* Align: ok

* Snap: ok

* Apply force/torque: nested model shows on the list and applying force to that doesn't work.

* Context menu: Right-clicking a nested model selects the parent model.

* Deleting: ok
content.html:
Just some notes about what currently works for nested models and what doesn't:

  • Logging: seems to record and playback correctly

  • Editing: Missing nested models when loading in the editor

  • Joint control panel: seems to work ok

  • Model list widget: nested models don't show under parent model as they should.

  • View collisions, CoM and so on: ok

  • Inserting:

    • Preview doesn't load nested models .

    • Nested model doesn't show on model list at all.

    • Insert two instances of the same model - nested models don't collide with each other

  • Copy / pasting: pasted nested model doesn't collide with original nested model but collides with other models.

  • Align: ok

  • Snap: ok

  • Apply force/torque: nested model shows on the list and applying force to that doesn't work.

  • Context menu: Right-clicking a nested model selects the parent model.

  • Deleting: ok
